response.overview: Is border control between the states a business? 2014 was one of the years most media in the Euro-African borders of Ceuta and Melilla. 'Walled' follows a traveler accompanied his guide dog, which seeks to understand how it works the Southern Border. Faced with a journalism that seeks to impact, Walled tries to humanize a through conversation with the various actors who inhabit the border: migrants, security forces, human rights activists and neighbors on both sides of the fence.
response.title: Amurallados
